snippet: Nearly two dozen engineering and physics professors weighed in Tuesday with a federal appeals court being asked to review New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady's four-game suspension for "Deflategate."...
lead_paragraph: Nearly two dozen engineering and physics professors weighed in Tuesday with a federal appeals court being asked to review New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady's four-game suspension for "Deflategate."

headline.main: Engineering and Physics Professors Weigh In on Brady Appeal
headline.print_headline: Engineering and Physics Professors Weigh In on Brady Appeal
